grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 実況【ジッキョウ】actual state (of things), real state, actual condition, real condition, actual scene, live, on-the-scene, reporting live, live coverage, live broadcasting, Let's Play
kun reading compounds: 況して【まして】still more, to say nothing of, not to mention, still less
況してや【ましてや】much less, to say nothing of
況んや【いわんや】much more, not to mention, not to speak of, to say nothing of, let alone
